site_name: Electricity Sub Station 22M From 1 The Mead
decision_conditions: An application to fell trees covered by a tree preservation order should be accompanied with evidence showing the need for the tree(s) removal.  This should either be a report showing:
a)	that the tree(s) health or structural condition is so poor that pruning or other works can no longer retain the tree(s) in a safe condition.
b)	That the tree has been proven to be causing structural damage.

This requirement is clearly stated on the TPO application form (Section 8).  As this evidence has not been provided with the application, Ealing Council refuses permission to remove the protected trees.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: TPO/1968/0086 T224, G1 - x3 Acer pseudoplatanus (Sycamore). Fell
